pages.text: These stones are formed when $(spiritual energy) is condensed by $(heaven and earth) in areas with an extreme density of $(spiritual energy) after being condensed and crystallised into Medium Spirit Stones. They can be used to power high level formations and help cultivators gather and condense $(spiritual energy) into $(diving qi).
This is what medium Spirit Stones look like when naturally formed.
High Spirit Stones can be condensed from Medium Spirit Stones by combining the $(spiritual energy) of mutliple Spirit Stones.
